## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -80.5)

### Iron smelting setup 1 at position (4.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (4.0, -60.0)
- Wooden chest at position (5.5, -59.5)
- Wooden chest at position (5.5, -58.5)

### Iron smelting setup 2 at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Wooden chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Attempting to extract from an empty furnace
- Furnaces need to have finished smelting ore before you can extract from them

## NAMESPACE

### Variables:
- No variables assigned
